quote: And even if fairies built a nest in the bottom of my garden and it should turn out that I have to live for a thousand years, there's not one of them when I'll be of a mind to trust you.
quote_letters: AND EVEN IF FAIRIES BUILT A NEST IN THE BOTTOM OF MY GARDEN AND IT SHOULD TURN OUT THAT I HAVE TO LIVE FOR A THOUSAND YEARS THERES NOT ONE OF THEM WHEN ILL BE OF A MIND TO TRUST YOU
